tweets.tweet_raw:
22 years ago today!
DIO released the 8th studio album "Magica" on this day, March 21, 2000. This concept album featured the return of Craig Goldy on guitar, with Jimmy Bain on bass, and Simon Wright on drums. https://t.co/2il8Q4PdxV
